name: Calema
description: '''Calema''' are a [[Musical ensemble|music duo]] from [[São Tomé and Príncipe]] with origins in [[Portugal]] formed by the two brothers António Mendes Ferreira (born 5 April 1992) and Fradique Mendes Ferreira (born 19 March 1987). The name of the duo refers to the special undulation on the African coast.
